title: Terraria 1.3.0.1 (Mac) (bundle)
description:
Terraria ported to Mac! This is just an initial release. Expect bugs. Tested in Yosemite, with working Multiplayer (Just joining, no hosting yet). No maps issues so far... It will be a bit slow at first (for about a minute when entering world), but it fixes right away.
If you encounter any bugs, let me know.
Version 1.3.0.2 coming soon...

Once opened, wait a bit. If opened many times, it WILL freeze. (Be patient)

Sorry for the file size, I will reduce it next time.

To change resolution, select the optimum one and change to windowed and then back to fullscreen (or viceversa). It should adjust then.

Enjoy!
